metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de reconstitución inmune en un caso de tuberculosis diseminada, tras retirada del tratamiento con adalimumab.
[Immune reconstitution syndrome in a case of disseminated tuberculosis after withdrawal of treatment with adalimumab].
